actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A025) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 106, 108, 110, 116, 117, 118, 120, 127, 128, 129, 132, 133, 134, 136, 138, 139, 140 and 145 printed in House Report 113-108. See page D569 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 106, 108, 110, 116, 117, 118, 120, 127, 128, 129, 132, 133, 134, 136, 138, 139, 140 and 145 printed in House Report 113-108.
